definition: to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
The first concern is affairs of state, enjoying the pleasure comes later. Quotation from essay On Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓記|岳阳楼记 by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4 yan1]

sentences.english: It rained， therefore the football match was put off.
sentences.chinese: 天下雨，所以足球比賽延期了。

sentences.english: This afternoon, Smell the flowers , I watched A song to remember.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，偷得浮生半日閒，看了《一曲難忘》。

sentences.english: The horse arrived, and it was a rare " thousand-mile".
sentences.chinese: 馬到了，果然是一匹天下少有的千里馬。

sentences.english: Perhaps this is what call "A house is not, how can sweep the world".
sentences.chinese: 這就是所說的“一屋不掃，何以掃天下”吧。

sentences.english: Are you going to the tailgate party this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你今天下午要去足球賽前的聚會嗎？

sentences.english: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven. (
sentences.chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下萬務都有定時。

sentences.english: The world can not conquers your Dad.
sentences.chinese: 天下事難不倒你的爸爸。

sentences.english: As the country is unstable, I pretended to be ill and escaped at night by boat. 0
sentences.chinese: 當時天下大亂，所以稱病在夜裏駕船逃走了。

sentences.english: Be sure to hand in your compositions this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 務必在今天下午把作文交來。

sentences.english: So-called world a stone, is the best orogenic material.
sentences.chinese: 號稱天下第一石，是造山的絕佳材料。

sentences.english: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven.
sentences.chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下萬務皆有定時。

sentences.english: This practice has nothing to do with the nation or society you live in.
sentences.chinese: 修行者也完全沒有要治國，甚至平天下的宏願。

sentences.english: This afternoon, State Councilor Dai Bingguo will meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午戴秉國國務委員也將會見他。

sentences.english: We were about to start when it began to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我們正要出發，就在這時天下起雨來。

sentences.english: The transgenic canola plants are not about to take over the world.
sentences.chinese: 轉基因油菜作物不可能將一統天下。

sentences.english: Ruling the nation by the filial piety was the principle of governance and administration characteristics in power during Tang Xuan' zong.
sentences.chinese: 以孝治天下是唐玄宗的治國原則和施政特點。
